title: inisai maamanDramey
sahitya:
innisai mAmanRamE vaiyam pugazh (innisai)

inRE pavazha vizhAk kANum vaibhOgamE

anupallavi

sennai mAnagar tannil isaippaNikkena amaindu

tannai iNaittiyangum munnODiyenat tigazh

caraNam

ANDavan aruLAl iDar palavum kaDandu

nINDa neDiyadOr payaNam tanait toDarndu

ANDezhupattaindu perumaiyuDan niRaindu

mANbu kuRraiyAdu marabadanaik kAttiyangum
